# Snake
Snake made with Python and Pygame !

<img src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/51634013/346839006-1b8c53fa-4df9-4ec0-bef9-06fafa9aa525.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..1WA1plpHYrPzWy_NMp2O20q_So9MYrzZ7kkXc-ybczA" width=45% height=45%>


## Prerequisites 
* [Python >= 3.10](https://www.python.org/)

* Pygame or [pygame-ce](https://pyga.me/) (I used pygame-ce)

## How to play
* git clone this repository
  ```bash
  git clone git@github.com:LucasColas/Snake.git
  ```
* go to the directory
  ```bash
  cd Snake
  ```
* run `main.py`
* Enjoy !
